original_text: And he made the holy anointing oil, and the pure incense of sweet spices, according to the work of the apothecary.
korean_text: 거룩한 관유와 향품으로 정결한 향을 만들었으되 향을 만드는 법대로 하였더라

sentences.original_text: And he made the holy anointing oil
and the pure incense of sweet spices
sentences.korean_translation: 향로운 향료로 만든 순수한 향을 만들었으며

sentences.original_text: according to the work of the apothecary
